definition: surname Piao/Korean surname (Park, Pak, or Bak)/also pr. [Pu2]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
Park Ji-sung (1981-), South Korean former footballer, played for Manchester United (2005-2012)
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
Park Chung-Hee (1917-1979), South Korean military man and dictator, president 1963-1979, influential in developing Korean industry, murdered by his bodyguard

sentences.english: I try to guess what the other person will say next in English.
sentences.chinese: 尝试猜猜别葌朴下来要说的英文是什么。

sentences.english: But Ms Park could salvage a little dignity by ending the circus now.
sentences.chinese: 但在刚结束的集会中，朴女士可以挽回一点尊严。

sentences.english: Which is the most popular surname in South Korea?
sentences.chinese: 在韩国，姓“朴”和姓“金”的最多。

sentences.english: Please tell Mr. Paik I'm sorry.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉朴先生我很抱歉。

sentences.english: Teach Piao told us to write a diary, so I am.
sentences.chinese: 朴老师告诉了我们写一篇日记，所以我要写。

sentences.english: Tub need add knit fabric, use matching color stitch on the tub edge.
sentences.chinese: 筒内加针织朴，筒边车边用撞色线。

sentences.english: Park's mother found his body in his home early Wednesday morning, the news agency reported.
sentences.chinese: 朴龙河的母亲星期三早晨在他家里发现他的尸体。

definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
